section.title: The quote element
section.p: The quote element represents a generic quotation container.

item.title: Flow
item.p: When its parent is an inline element or a block element that only allows inline elements its flow is inline, otherwise its flow is block.

section.p: The citation attribute must be used to provide the URI (xs:anyURI) of the resource cited when the flow of quote element is inline, otherwise it must not be used.
